mapper.select:
select aa.*,bb.name compName,cc.name commName,dd.name areaName from r_parking_space aa left join s_company bb on aa.comp_id = bb.id left join r_community cc on aa.comm_id = cc.id left join r_comm_area dd on aa.comm_area_id = dd.id
${ew.customSqlSegment}
select id from r_community where name=#{name} and is_delete = 0
select id from s_company where name=#{name} and is_delete = 0
select id from r_comm_area where name=#{name} and is_delete = 0
select id from r_building where name=#{name} and is_delete = 0
select id from r_unit where name=#{name} and is_delete = 0
